data.description: Light text on dark background for ChOP v4

data.name: Google Table
data.description: Group page styles for Hattrick.org based on the Google tables.

data.name: Messenger Monokai
data.description:
Forked from: https://userstyles.org/styles/112397/facebook-messenger-the-dark-side
Using colors from: https://chriskempson.github.io/base16/

Monospaced fonts. Smaller fonts sizes.
Works with: KaTeX Math functionality.

Group chats are easily identifiable.

data.name: Quora Just Answers
BBS.IO-TECH.fi Classic Dark Theme - Xenforo 2.1
data.description:
Install stylus extension: Chromium based: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne?hl=en
Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/styl-us/

Classic gray theme for bbs.io-tech.fi Xenforo 2.1 update. Select classic dark as a selected theme on the site first (though it should work pretty similarly with both dark themes now).

data.name: Roblox aesthetic wallaper #1
Roblox aesthetic wallaper
Channel 4 (All4) Dark+
data.description:
A new and improved dark theme for Channel 4 (All 4), making it easier on the eyes and removing most page adverts.
Icons/Images are also adapter to the dark style.
